name: Thai Lights
description: Thai Lights is a sativa-dominant blend that crosses the uplifting effects of Thai sativas with the stable and robust Northern Lights. Originally bred by Dr. Atomic, Thai lights is a dynamic hybrid that boasts sweet earthy flavors and a cerebral buzz that accommodates social outings with an energetic rush of happiness. Medical patients applaud Thai Lights’ ability to combat depression and minimize the debilitating effects of migraine headaches.
attributes_title: Uplifted, Happy, Relaxed, Talkative, Energetic, Depression, Fatigue, Headaches, Stress, Lack of Appetite, Dry Mouth, Dry Eyes, Anxious
